para.text: Two members of the Ethics Board shall constitute a quorum for the transaction of business.
The Ethics Board may delegate to an individual member or to the Director of Government Ethics its power to investigate or hold a hearing.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2 of Ethics Board Quorum Emergency Amendment Act of 2017 (D.C. Act 22-160, Oct. 23, 2017, 64 DCR 10772).
For temporary (225 days) amendment of this section, see § 2 of Ethics Board Quorum Temporary Amendment Act of 2017 (D.C. Law 22-40, Jan. 17, 2018, 64 DCR 12304).
